```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, load packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

```{r, read in the data}

data <- read_csv("data.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()

temp <- data %>%
  select(date, tmax, tmin)
  
precip <- data %>% 
  select(date, prcp)
```

```{r, data exploration}

maxtemp_plot <- temp %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = tmax))+
  geom_line()

maxtemp_plot

mintemp_plot <- temp %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = tmin)) +
  geom_line()

mintemp_plot

prcp_plot <- precip %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = prcp)) +
  geom_line()

prcp_plot

```
